description.value: Rumor says the first alabaster helix originated on a hidden world somewhere in the Vast. This aeon stone must adjust to your physiology by orbiting you for 24 hours. If the stone stops orbiting you for more than 1 minute, it must readjust to you. The stone can orbit you while you’re prone or unconscious, but it stops orbiting you if you die. While the alabaster helix orbits and remains adjusted to you, you regain 1 Hit Point per hour. You can have only one alabaster helix adjusted to your physiology at a time.
